history.proof: intros. destruct H as [H1 H2]. right. split. + apply H2. + apply H1.

exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.
In environment H1 : forall x : nat, P x H2 : B Unable to unify "P ?M1381" with "(forall y : nat, P y) /\\ P 0 \\/ B /\\ P 0".

original: intros. destruct H as [H1 H2]. split. - intro y. apply H1. - right. split. + apply H2. + apply H1.
